# 수식 1. Rate equation for different inhibition model types

\br

- Competitive

$$
v=\frac{V_{max}[S]}{[S]}+K_m(\left(1+\frac{[I]}{K_i}\right)
$$

\br

- Non-competitive

$$
v=\frac{V_{max}[S]}{K_m(\left(1+\frac{[I]}{K_i}\right)+[S]\left(1+\frac{[I]}{K_i}\right)}
$$

\br

- Uncompetitive

$$
v=\frac{V_{max}[S]}{K_m+[S]\left(1+\frac{[I]}{K_i}\right)}
$$

- Mixed

$$
v=\frac{V_{max}[S]}{K_m(\left(1+\frac{[I]}{K_i}\right)+[S]\left(1+\frac{[I]}{aK_i}\right)}
$$

\br

# 수식2. Estimation of Ki value based on IC50 value

$$
K_i=\frac{IC_{50}}{(S/K_m+1)}
\left\{
\begin{align*}
&ifS=K_m,&K_i &=IC_{50}/2&
\\ 
&ifS>>K_m,&K_i &=<<IC_{50}&
\\ 
&ifS<<K_m,&K_i &\cong IC_{50}&
\end{align*}
\right.
$$

\br

# 수식 3. Percent inhibition calculation for single point aasy in TDI

$$
percent inhibition=100*
(1-\left(\left(\frac{R_{Testcmpd + NADPH}}{R_{Vehicle + NADPH}}\right) 
/ \left(\frac{R_{Testcmpd - NADPH}}{R_{Vehicle -NADPH}}\right)\right)
$$
